name: Abinash Kalita
review: The best dealer i have ever visited. They have awesome collection of cars and all are with best conditions! I recently bought one car from themâ€¦the owners are really professionalâ€¦and staffs are also good. I recommend everyone who wants to buy a car should must visit The Car Store!

name: Bedanta Dutta
review: I recently discovered The Car Store through the OLX used car sale portal, and from the first interaction, their responsiveness stood out. Upon visiting, I set my eyes on a Mercedes Gla 200, and after inspecting the vehicle, the decision to purchase was easy. The negotiation process and financing were seamlessly handled by their team. The delivery, just three days later, was a delight. The car looked as good as new, a testament to their professionalism and attention to detail. The Car Store houses a range of exotic luxury brands, showcasing their commitment to quality. What particularly warmed my heart was witnessing a group of enthusiastic Assamese boys managing the business with a high level of professionalism. Their good behavior and commitment to excellence are truly commendable. I extend my best wishes to The Car Store and eagerly anticipate my next visit. It's a pleasure to support such a dedicated and customer-focused establishment.

review: Very good behaviour of all staff and provide genuine very good condition vehicle
